content:
I was wondering which solutions different jurisdictions have adopted to represent municipality , regional and other address part related codes.

The approach we are considering now in Italy is to use the ISO-21090-SC-coding extension

I saw that for example Denmark, has defined specific address extensions
image.png

Who else has this need ?
what others are doing ?
do you think we can come up with a common solution at least at the European level ?
...the only exception we (HL7 IT) are thinking to the usage of the ISO-21090-SC-coding extension is for the municipality/country code of birth, in order to avoid extensions nesting ...
HL7 DK here - we would love to do this cross EU - the values of the subdivision codes comes from https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:code:3166:DK
